message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: This ICD Code already exists.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_STARTDATE_AFTER_ENDDATE
message.locale: End Date must be later than or equal to the Start Date.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_STARTDATE_BEFORE_ASSOCIATED_VERSION_STARTDATE
message.locale: Start Date must be later than or equal to the version Release date, %1d

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_STARTDATE_ENTERED_FOR_INEDIT_VERSION
message.locale: Start Date cannot be entered for this version as it is In Edit.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_ENDDATE_ENTERED_FOR_INEDIT_VERSION
message.locale: End Date cannot be entered for this version as it is In Edit.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_RECORD_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The requested record not found.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_TRANSLATION_DUPLICATE
message.locale: An ICD Code translation in this language has already been created in this version.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_ENDDATE_CROSSING_ASSOCIATED_VERSION_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date must be earlier than the end date of the version.

message.name: NO_ICD_CODE_FOUND
message.locale: There are no Search Results found to match your Search Criteria

message.name: ERR_RELEASE_DATE_IN_PAST
message.locale: Start Date must be equal to or later than upload date.

message.name: RECORD_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No Current ICD Code Version exists.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_FOR_ICD_CODE_IN_EDIT
message.locale: End Date cannot be entered for this ICD Code as it is In Edit.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_BEFORE_REMOVE_DATE_OF_ICD_CODE_VERSION
message.locale: End Date must not be later than the Remove date of the ICD Code version, %1d

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_ALREADY_REMOVED
message.locale: This ICD Code has already been removed.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_IN_PAST
message.locale: End Date must not be earlier than current date.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_NOT_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: End Date must be equal to current date as this ICD Code Version is In Edit.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_VERSION_ALREADY_REMOVED
message.locale: This ICD Code Version has already been removed.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_ASSOCIATED_WITH_CONDITION
message.locale: The ICD Code has an associated condition and cannot be removed.

message.name: ERR_ONE_OR_MORE_ICD_CODE_ASSOCIATED_WITH_CONDITION
message.locale: This ICD Code Version has one or more ICD Codes with current condition associations, and cannot be removed.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_DUPLICATE
message.locale: An ICD Code translation for this language has already been created in this version.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_TRANSLATION_MODIFY_DUPLICATE
message.locale: An ICD Code translation in this language has already been created in this version.

message.name: ICD_CODE_UPLOAD_COMPLETED
message.locale: Upload completed successfully.

message.name: ICD_CODE_FILE_FORMAT_NOT_MATCHING
message.locale: File is not in the selected Format.

message.name: ICD_CODE_LARGE_FILE
message.locale: File is too large.

message.name: ICD_CODE_FILEPATH_NOT_VALID
message.locale: The path specified for the file is not valid.

message.name: ERR_RELEASE_START_DATE_N_UPLOAD_DATE
message.locale: Start Date must be equal to or later than upload date.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_EMPTY
message.locale: ICD Code must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ICD_TEXT_EMPTY
message.locale: ICD Text must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_TRANSLATION_TEXT_EMPTY
message.locale: Translation Text must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ICD_CODE_VERSION_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: The version number should be unique.

message.name: ERR_REMOVE_ICDCODE_END_DATE_NOT_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: End Date must be equal to current date as this ICD Code has In Edit version status.
